name: Epinephrine Chloride Solution
indications: 1 INDICATIONS AND USAGE For use as a nasal decongestant. Apply locally as drops or spray, or with a sterile swab, as required.
warningsAndPrecautions: 3 WARNINGS AND PRECAUTIONS Caution: Administer with caution to elderly people. Do not use if high blood pressure, heart disease, diabetes, or thyroid disease is present unless directed by a physician. If prompt relief is not obtained, consult a physician. Administer to pediatric patients under six years of age only on the advice of a physician.
adverseReactions: 5 ADVERSE REACTIONS To report SUSPECTED ADVERSE REACTIONS, contact BPI Labs, LLC at ( 727 ) 471-0850 or FDA at 1-800-FDA-1088 or www.fda.gov/medwatch.
